caption:
This image captures a river scene with a tugboat actively navigating the waters under a red bridge. The tugboat, predominantly white with a black hull and two visible decks, is pushing a large red barge. The barge spans almost the full width of the photo, and its flat surface suggests it could be used for transporting goods or materials.

The bridge above is a simple, single-span structure with a modest design, connecting two land masses. Underneath it, on one side of the river, the terrain rises steeply, forming a rocky hill that leads up to a building labeled "MOTEL" with a clear, classic motel-style architecture. Adjacent to the motel is a small structure with a green and white striped awning, adding a pop of color to the hillside setting.

The opposite bank of the river features lush green trees that provide a dense natural barrier, possibly marking the edge of a park or preserved natural area. In the background, beyond the bridge, more greenery and hillside can be seen, suggesting that this location is fairly remote or situated in a region with significant natural landscapes.

The overall color palette of the image includes earthy tones accented by the bright colors of the man-made structures (red of the bridge and barge, and the various colors of the motel and its surroundings), creating a visually dynamic image that captures both human activity and natural beauty.
title: Barge passes under bridge that will link interstate-77 with the West Virginia turnpike
